headline: GreenScape Lawn Care
subheadline: Beautiful, Healthy Lawns for Your Home
description: From weekly mowing to seasonal treatments, we keep your lawn looking its best year-round with reliable service and professional results.
heroCTAHint: This could open a simple quote form where customers enter their address, lawn size, and preferred services.
servicesSubheading: Complete lawn care solutions for residential properties throughout the area.

services.name: Weekly Mowing
services.description: Professional mowing, edging, and trimming to keep your lawn neat and healthy all season long.
services.hint: This could link to a detailed service page with pricing tiers, schedule options, and before/after photos.

services.name: Fertilization Programs
services.description: Custom fertilization schedules designed for your grass type and local climate conditions.
services.hint: This could open a seasonal program guide showing treatment schedules and expected results for each season.

services.name: Spring & Fall Cleanup
services.description: Thorough seasonal cleanups including leaf removal, bed prep, and debris clearing.
services.hint: This could display a gallery of cleanup projects with seasonal package details and add-on options.

services.name: Aeration & Seeding
services.description: Core aeration and overseeding services to improve soil health and fill in thin or bare spots.
services.hint: This could show timing recommendations, process videos, and results timeline with booking options.

about.heading: Local Expertise. Reliable Service.
paragraphs: GreenScape Lawn Care has been serving homeowners since 2010. Our team understands local soil conditions, grass types, and seasonal challenges to deliver results that last.
We believe in straightforward pricing, dependable weekly service, and treating every lawn like it's our own. Whether you need basic mowing or a complete care program, we're here to help.
All work is backed by our satisfaction guarantee. Licensed and insured for your peace of mind.
about.hint: This could expand into a full company page with team photos, service area map, certifications, and customer testimonials.

cta.heading: Ready for a lawn you'll love?
cta.subheading: Get a free quote and see how easy great lawn care can be.
cta.hint: This could open a quote form with service selection, or trigger a phone call on mobile devices during business hours.
